title: Universo Coffee.ar
about_us_description: We are a new concept of “COFFEE OF EXCELLENCE” in Argentina with more 15 years of experience touring traditional farms Colombian, Brazilian, Bolivian and Peruvian coffee growers. Learning Filtering and tasting techniques in the central and northern area of ​​the jungle. Peruvian with training in fertilization, collection and selection. grains (“Postharvest”); various drying techniques. Experience in foreign marketing of cereals to different places such as TAIWAN; PORCELAIN; SPAIN; CHILI. Our raw material has a value higher than 89 points in the cup. - PREMIUM COFFEE / HEALTHY LINE / MEDICAL COFFEE -
first_about_us_tasks: SENIOR MANAGEMENT PRESS - DISSEMINATION - CORPORATE EVENTS

cart_description: You are just a few steps away from completing your purchase
ourCourses_description: Discover the art of coffee with our Coffee Master, Rafael Mancini. With over 15 years of experience, Rafael has explored the most iconic coffee farms in Colombia, Brazil, Bolivia, and Peru. In the heart of Peru’s central and northern jungle, he mastered every step of the coffee-making process—from fertilization, harvesting, and grain selection to innovative drying and roasting techniques. Learn how roasting can unlock the rich aromas and flavors of coffee, and become an expert in every stage of creating the perfect cup. Join our community and share the passion for coffee with a master who blends tradition and expertise in every detail.
store_description: Find everything you need to embrace your passion for coffee
wsp_button: Do you want an event with us? Write to us!
